department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The contractor is required to provide for Canada, life rafts on behalf of the Department of National Defence. The contractor will also provide a technical data package
description: The contractor is required to provide to Canada, on behalf of the the Department of National Defence Life Rats, inflatable in accordance with the Specification at Annex B and all applicable documents, Dwg 8959485 20RBN Life raft, General Arrangement, Dwg 8959490 Water Pocket and Dwg 8959495 Inflation, System Assembly referenced in the Design Data List DDL no 8482 229239. The Technical data is available under separate cover, upon request for the bid documents. Therefore, it is imperative that this request for the bid documentation be done as soon as possible to ensure timely receipt of the associated technical data.
full_summary:
_____________________
# Request for Proposal: Life Raft for the Department of National Defence

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites certified and experienced contractors to bid on a Request for Proposal (RFP) project for the provision of Life Rafts for the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Project Details

| Attribute | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3990016746 | Official identifier for this project |
| Reference Number | WS3990016746-Doc3992769188 | Unique identifier assigned by the PSPC |
| Publication Date | 2023-05-17 | Original publication date of this RFP |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-12-08T14:00:00 | Deadline for bidding submissions |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-06-17 | Anticipated start date of the contract |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2024-08-21 | Anticipated end date of the contract |

### Goods and Services

* Category: General Supplies (GD)
* UNSPSC Classification: 25111601 (Lifeboats or Liferafts)
* Quantity: To be determined by DND

### Procurement Method

* Competitive and open bidding

### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

The contract is open to certified contractors who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

### Other Details
The contract will be closed on 2024-08-21 and will be delivered to British Columbia and Nova Scotia. For more information, contact Manon Swanson at  manon.swanson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

_____________________
*"No comment"*
